title: Keycap Digit Two

adjectives: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude
Number-two; following after the first one with nothing between them. The ordinal number corresponding to the cardinal number two.
That which comes after the first.
verbs: To determine the number (of objects in a group).
Determine the number or amount of
nouns: A concept of quantity involving zero and units
Mathematical object used to count, label, and measure
A number is one of several related types of mathematical objects.
A member of one of several classes: natural numbers, integers, rational numbers, real numbers, complex numbers, quaternions.
A set of numerals for representing numbers.
The natural number following 1 and preceding 3
A numerical value equal to 2; the second number in the set of natural numbers (especially in number theory); the cardinality of the set 0, 1; one plus one. Ordinal: second. This many dots (••).
The cardinal number that is the sum of one and one or a numeral representing this number
2 is a number, numeral, and glyph.

description: The number 2 on a square with rounded corners, designed to look like a keycap.
apple_vendor_description: Apple’s keycap digit two emoji presents a crisp, clean numeral '2' encased in a softly rounded, slightly raised key. The design on Apple devices features a subtle glossy sheen and precise, realistic lighting, giving it a tactile feel. This emoji is perfect for indicating a second option, a count of two, or a sequential order in digital conversations.
